ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: hiya and welcome to the list.  As a 20th lvl cleric, i help all who i see, unless i am in a group and we are fighting, as i may need my manna for heals within
ygData.messageBody:
hiya and welcome to the list. As a 20th lvl cleric, i help all who i see,
unless i am in a group and we are fighting, as i may need my manna for heals
within my group. I have made a staunch rule that my group comes first!! As
a clecic i heal my party members first even if it means i will lose my life.
If i am in a battle and someone calls for help the only way i help them is
when i am done with the current battle or if my party members have the fight
under control. Often times i go to places that i know i am way to high to
be and just stand back and heal others, i enjoy helping and thats why i
chose to be a cleric. Again welcome to the list **hugs**


>From: AsmodeusDP@...
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour
>Date: Fri, 20 Aug 1999 23:01:02 EDT
>
>From: AsmodeusDP@...
>
>I'm new to this mail list, and thought I would introduce myself with a
>topic
>to discuss. I've often wondered what exactly it means to be a cleric in
>Norrath. My personal opinion is that we should always be merciful to those
>around us, and help in any way we can. Even if to heal someone we don't
>even
>know completely depletes our mana. What do you think of this?
>
>
>Nofur<Pact of Aegis> of Karana
